cause.description:
The Wallingford Acting Community (WAC) was created to allow an oppertunity for young actors and artists to come together during the summer and produce a play in a community setting. We aim to include students from all walks of life and from all schools in Wallingford.
1. Support the creation of Wallingford Acting Community (WAC).
2. Support the production of a play during each summer.
3. Give students a chance to do something positive for Wallingford.
cause.mission: Support the actors, stage crew, artists, and friends involved with the Wallingford Acting Community
cause.name: Support Wallingford Acting Community
